channel.title: Ok i need to know hw to change the combat level
channel.description: i changed the total level on skills to 300 and now im level 156 how do i change it to like 250 or something is there like a percentage i could change?

item.title: Ok i need to know hw to change the combat level
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

There is a maximum amount of 200 per skill. If you have all 300 trade skills you will be a level 0 because you will have no left over total level for combat skills.

Maximum comat level = 255
Maximum skill level = 200

Read full topic
item.source: Ok i need to know hw to change the combat level
